id.description: The unique identifier for the sprint.

self.description: The URL link to fetch more details about the sprint.

state.description: The current state/status of the sprint.

name.description: The name or title of the sprint.

startDate.description: The date and time when the sprint is scheduled to start.

endDate.description: The date and time when the sprint is expected to end.

completeDate.description: The date and time when the sprint was completed.

originBoardId.description: The original board ID the sprint belongs to.

boardId.description: Used to determine which board the sprint is a part of. (Not always the same as originBoardId)

goal.description: The goal or objective of the sprint.

createdDate.description: The date and time when the sprint was created.
